thread.title: Leslie H. Armstrong
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Leslie H. Armstrong

author: Leslie H. Armstrong
title: Leslie H. Armstrong
text:
Erin Murphy did a very good job helping us get everything set up and ready to go. Just received the safety vest yesterday and they look good. I think all my employee's are going to like them as well, since they all work at night. This will help keep them visible and hopefully safe. Good product.
Les Armstrong
Stripe-N-Sweep,Inc
President
